description.narrative: By 2025, in priority areas, communities will acquire skills in family and community practices favourable to the protection of children against violence and child labour, and front-line services will provide relevant services, including in humanitarian situations (San-PÃ©dro, SoubrÃ©, Abobo, OdiennÃ©, and Korhogo)., which contributes to Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, girls, boys, and adolescents in CÃ´te d'Ivoire benefit from a legal identity and are protected from violence, exploitation, negligence, and harmful practices.

title.narrative: By 2025, in priority areas, communities will acquire skills in family and community practices favourable to the protection of children against violence and child labour, and front-line services will provide relevant services, including in humanitarian situations (San-Pédro, Soubré, Abobo, Odienné, and Korhogo).
